statements: DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 500 AND sale_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 500 AND sale_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE id = 10 AND sale_amount > 100.0
DELETE FROM customer_data WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York'
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 100);

DELETE FROM products
WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10 AND price > 50;
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE total_price < 100)
